# Atat端rk Monument (Artvin)

The Atat端rk Monument, also known as the Artvin Atat端rk Statue, is a monument in Artvin, Turkey. The monument consists of the world's largest Atat端rk statue made of steel and copper. The monument was completed in 2012 and unveiled in a ceremony in 2017. It is the most popular site in Artvin, with more than 35,000 visitors per year. The monument was sculpted by Georgian sculptor Jumber Jikia.
